name: Stupid Beast!
description:
Play as a stupid beast that is trying to escape from the Einhar, the great hunter.

This is a non-profit Path of Exile fan game. Sound effects are taken from the same title.

It's suggested to download and play the windows build for better performance.

GAMEPLAY
- survive as long as possible without being captured by beastmaster Einhar
- pick up potions to restore health
- destroy green tiles by sacrificing some of your health
- you earn score by destroying tiles and surving

CONTROLS
- WASD or arrow keys to move
- spacebar to destroy tiles
- spacebar or mouse to press buttons
